returns._0: bool True if the token exists

getPaper(uint256).details: Gets paper details by token ID

params.tokenId: The ID of the paper's SBT

returns._0: Paper struct containing the paper details

getPaperVersion(uint256,uint256).details: Gets a specific version of a paper

params.tokenId: The ID of the paper's SBT
params.versionNumber: The version number to retrieve (1-based index)

returns._0: Version struct for the specified version

getPaperVersionHistory(uint256).details: Gets the version history of a paper

params.tokenId: The ID of the paper's SBT

returns._0: Array of Version structs representing the paper's history

getPapersByAuthor(address).details: Gets all papers by an author

returns._0: tokenIds Array of token IDs owned by the author

isAuthor(uint256).details: Checks if caller is author of a paper

params.tokenId: The ID of the paper's SBT

isPaperAuthor(uint256,address).details: Checks if caller is author of a paper

params.tokenId: The ID of the paper's SBT
params.user: The address against which want to check

isPublisher(uint256,address).details: Checks if caller is publisher of a paper

params.tokenId: The ID of the paper's SBT
params.user: The address against which want to check

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setStatusUpdater(address,bool).details: Authorizes a contract to update paper statuses (for contract integration)

params.isAuthorized: Whether the address should be authorized or not

submitPaper(string,string,string).details: Submits a new research paper and mints an SBT to the author

returns._0: tokenId The ID of the newly minted SBT

params.tokenId: The ID of the paper's SBT

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updatePaperHash(uint256,string,string).details: Updates the IPFS hash for a paper (only author can update) and tracks version history

params.changeNotes: Notes describing the changes in this version
params.tokenId: The ID of the paper's SBT

updatePaperStatus(uint256,uint8).details: Updates the status of a paper

params.tokenId: The ID of the paper's SBT

verifyPaper(string).details: Verifies if a token exists and returns its details

returns._0: exists Boolean indicating if the paper exists
returns._1: tokenId The ID of the paper's SBT (0 if it doesn't exist)
